name: Little Casino
overview:
Little Casino was produced by Digital Controls in 1984.

This game was designed mainly for bartop or countertop cabinets. Interestingly enough, the control panel advertises Poker, Blackjack, Craps and HiLo. The back-lit buttons are red and they flash in cycles during the attract mode in cycles. During the game, the buttons light identifying which options are available.

Choose from five games: BlackJack, Poker, Craps, Slots, or Horse. Bet with imaginary 'money' (points, actually).
